snippet.title: The Midnight Crimes - Official Overview Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Join members of the development team at DeadlyCrow Games for a deep dive into The Midnight Crimes, an upcoming point-and-click detective adventure game. The team discusses the story, introduces you to the main characters, the game's artistic style, and touches on some of the features, like how your choices can affect the story, crime-solving mechanics, and more. The Midnight Crimes will be available on PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo Switch, and a demo is available now on Steam.


Play as Benjamin Leighton, a retired private detective investigating the case of a missing child while facing his own past demons. Midnight Cove, the wicked Victorian city you live in, features semi-open world mechanics, side-quests, pets, character relationships, and much more.
